page.title: 06THE RUDOLF STEINER SCHOOL
page.content: There is an allowance given to the individual units every month to cover all expenses.There are house parents and children of different ages to give a family atmosphere. { { RECREATION AND THERAPY Inside the school there is a swimming pool and a gymnasium.These are often used by the children who are encouraged to get involved. Ther are many different therapies available for individuals or groups of handicapped people.Some of the therapies available are physiotherapy, drama therapy,play therapy,speech therapy,drawing therapy and music therapy.Only after each child has been assesed are these therapies recommen- ded.
